ModMetaData.name: Pixel Wizardry
ModMetaData.author: Scurvyez
ModMetaData.description:
Discord: Steve o.O#1151 steam: Scurvyez
This is a mod purely for mod-makers. It adds serveral new shaders for use with RimWorld textures. Some of the shaders produce blending effects similar to those found in programs like Photoshop. The currently available shaders include Linear Dodge (Add), Linear Burn, Screen, Multiply, and Subtract, RGBToBlack, RGBToGrayscale, HSVToRGB, and pusling versions of most of them.
Shoutout to Hershey. You've been the absolute best pal a developer could ask for.
